title: Structural Injustice & Workers' Rights with Virginia Mantouvalou
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: I'm joined by Virginia Mantouvalou to discuss her upcoming book on worker's rights. We look at how state rules and regulations can make workers at risk of explotation, and the role of human rights in addressing these injustices.
itunes:subtitle: I'm joined by Virginia Mantouvalou to discuss herâ€¦
description: I'm joined by Virginia Mantouvalou to discuss her upcoming book on worker's rights. We look at how state rules and regulations can make workers at risk of explotation, and the role of human rights in addressing these injustices.
